@references.transparency: Values range from 0-100%, 100% means it is fully visible.

desc: The mod may change the appearance of an item (or other visual components), by for example manipulating it's tooltip.

If such a modification is present there will be a <color #355AA0>🌊</color> prefix (or whatever modify indicator is selected), this is done to help identify the origin of any changes and therefore we advise against disabling it.

text_shadow.desc: Disables text shadows for all messages sent by SkyOcean.

prefix_gradient.desc: Changes the gradient that is used for the prefix.

clickable_prefix.desc: Makes SkyOceans chat message prefix clickable, opening the config screen.

desc: Items modified or added by SkyOcean will have a small indicator (normally <color #355AA0>🌊</color>) in their name.
This indicator can be customized here.
Enables a few different debugs, throughout the mod
<red>May lead to crashes or unexpected/undefined behaviour

blaze.desc: Highlights the blaze slayer in the color of the current attunement

own_boss.desc: Adds glow highlights to your slayer boss

minis.desc: Highlights all minibosses with a <red>red</red> glow effect.

big_boys.desc: Highlight higher tier mini bosses in <dark_red>dark red</dark_red>.

modifyCommissions.desc: Modifies commission items to be visually different when you started or finished it.

forge_reminder.desc: Sends a reminder if you have unclaimed expired forge items

forge_reminder_delay.desc: The delay between reminders in minutes.

forge_reminder_action.desc: What clickable action will show when the timer is over.

desc: Turns most carpets in the dwarven mines <red>red</red> to make them more visible.
Allows resource packs to change the appearance of tungsten, umber and glacite tunnel blocks.
Allows resource packs to change the appearance of blocks in the mist.
Allows resource packs to change the appearance of gemstones.

hollows.desc: Allows resource packs to change the appearance of most hardstone blocks and ores in the hollows.

pity_message.desc: Sends your current Pity when you find a mineshaft.

desc: Send a chat or party message when you enter a Mineshaft.
Will send in chat if not in a party.

announce-type.desc: The type of message to send when you enter a Mineshaft.

waypoint.desc: Show a waypoint on all possible Corpse Locations in a Mineshaft.

show_title.desc: Shows a title in addition to the announcement message.

key-announce.desc: Send a chat message how many keys of the current mineshaft corpses you have in your sacks.

wormCooldown.desc: Notifies you when you can spawn another worm.

wormPetMessage.desc: Changes the pet drop message to include the pet rarity.

wormPetTitle.desc: Notifies you via title when you drop a pet.

hotm.@value: Heart of the Mountain Perk Modifier

shiftCost.desc: Shows the amount of powder that will be consumed on shift click.

totalProgress.desc: Shows your total progress to maxing a perk.

stackSize.desc: Shows the perk level as item stack count.

totalLeft.desc: Displays the total amount that is still required to max a perk.

reminder.desc: Lets you add reminders for when you have enough powder to buy a perk.

reminderTitle.desc: Shows a title when the reminder triggers.

area_walls.desc: Adds walls between the areas in the crystal hollows.

puzzler.desc: Highlights the correct block for the puzzler.

metalDetector.desc: Enables the metal detector solver, which helps you find treasures in the Mines of Divan.

playDingOnFind.desc: Plays a sound when the metal detector finds a treasure.

showTitleOnFind.desc: Shows a title when the metal detector finds a treasure.

sack_value.desc: Shows the value of all items in your sacks.

price_source.desc: The source to use for the price of items in sacks.

inventory_buttons.desc: Settings to configure and change inventory buttons.

enabled.desc: Whether to show the Inventory Buttons.

desc: Configure Buttons in a separate UI.

profile_in_chat.desc: Show the profile icon in chat messages.
profile_in_chat.warning: <yellow>SkyOcean by default adds the profile emblem into chat messages, if you wish to change this open the config and search for <gold>Profile in Chat</gold>!

white_non_message.desc: Changes the color of messages sent by unranked players from gray to white.

piggy_repair_helper.desc: Sends a chat message to get 8 Enchanted Pork from sacks when the piggy bank breaks.

sack_notification.desc: Show a notification when you gain specific sack items.

sack_notification_items.desc: The items to show notifications for.

desc: Adds a <light_purple>/rboop</light_purple> command that runs /boop on the last person that messaged you.
<red>Requires to change servers to take into effect.</red>

pest_bait_type.desc: Adds a UI element that shows which pest bait increases the chance of spawning a specific pest.

desk_pest_highlight.desc: Highlights on what Plot how many pests are on in the 'Configure Plots' menu.

pest_warning.desc: Warns you when you reach 4 or more pests while farming.

pest_warning_delay.desc: The delay between reminders in seconds.

ministerInCalendar.desc: Adds a current minister next to the mayor in the calendar.

anvilHelper.desc: Highlights books that have the same enchantment as the ones in the anvil.

itemStarStacksize.desc: Shows the Item Star amount as the stacksize.

revertMasterStars.desc: Reverts the Master Star back to the stacked colored look.

previousServer.desc: Sends a chat message when you join a server you were previously in.

previousServerTime.desc: The time a server is cached and shows up as previously joined.

hideLightning.desc: Hides lightning bolts and sky flash effect.

desc: Makes text shadow render as "full" all around the glyph.

showHiddenPetCandy.desc: Hypixel hides the pet candy line once its max level, this feature re-adds the line.

desc: Specify what island shouldn't render Clouds.
Useful for islands like the Dwarven Mines where clouds can be annoying.
islandCloudHider.warning: <yellow>SkyOcean hides clouds on this island by default, if you wish to change this open the config and search for <gold>Island Cloud Hider</gold>!

customization_vanilla_integration.@value: Animate dyes and skins in inventories
desc: Will always animate dyed armors and helmet skins even in inventories or menus.
<yellow>(Doesn't currently work with skins that allow variant selection or pets)</yellow>

hideEntityFire.desc: Removes the fire effect from all entities.

itemSearch.desc: Item Search is a feature that allows you to search for items in your inventory, backpacks, storage, sacks, island chests and more.

itemHighlight.desc: Choose what color the searched item will be highlighted with.

highlightMode.desc: Choose how items will be highlighted.

highlightTime.desc: Amount of time that items will be highlighted for, in seconds.

useReiSearchBar.desc: Replaces REI's inventory highlighting with SkyOcean's

preserve_search.desc: When reopening the item search, it will keep the previous search input and category instead of clearing them.

museumIntegration.desc: Changes the museum to highlight items that are found on your profile, furthermore it also tells you which items you can craft and which ones are not craftable at all.

warp_to_island.desc: Automatically warp to island if you click an item that is on it.

museumArmourPieces.desc: Displays all pieces required to finish an armor set in the tooltip in the museum.

desc: Craft helper is a feature that lets you see all the steps in a recipe and how much progress you have made towards completing it.

<gray>Pro Tip:</gray> You can also import SkyShard Trees into your CraftHelper by pressing <gray>"Copy Tree"</gray>, then <gray>"SkyOcean Format"</gray> on the Website and running <gray>/skyocean recipe skyshards</gray> in-game!

enabled.desc: Whether the craft helper is enabled or not, this is the main switch.

quick_set.desc: Adds a clickable item into multiple different screens like recipe, forge, visitors, ... to quickly add the item into the crafthelper.

hideCompleted.desc: Whether to hide completed parts of the tree or not.

parentAmount.desc: Includes the amount that is already present through parents.

disableRootItems.desc: Prevents the craft helper from showing any progress for the root node, making it simpler for certain items.

disallowedItemSources.desc: Select sources from which the craft helper will ignore.

position.desc: Craft helper position inside the inventory.

margin.desc: How much space to leave between the inventory/screen edges and the craft helper element.

done_message.@value: Send a message when your recipe is complete
done_message.desc: Sends a chat message whenever the mod detects your recipe tree as completed.

tree_formatter.desc: Changes the appearance of the craft helper tree.

raw_formatter_hide_completed.desc: Hides completed elements from the raw formatter, <yellow>also applies to the hud element!

enable_hud_overlay.desc: Shows the progress to finishing the recipe on screen.

overlay_background.desc: Adds a background behind the overlay to make it more readable.

desc: Settings to change the appearance of armours on either yourself or others.
Replaces the hypixel mob icons with a spelled out version.
<red>This requires a nametag update, meaning it doesn't refresh instantly!</red>

display_type.desc: Changes the way the mob icons are displayed.

desc: Overwrites the colors for the different mob icons.
The default <white>#FFFFFF</white> means that it doesn't get changed at all.
Changes players in the world to be rendered as the selected animal!
You can choose between <white>Nobody</white>, <white>Self</white>, <white>Players (non NPCs)</white> and <white>Everyone</white>.

type.desc: The animal to use as substitution for players.

config.desc: Allows you to modify the appearance of an animal, if supported!

own_collar.desc: The collar color used for yourself.

other_collar.desc: The collar color used for others.

desc: Whether to use a baby model for yourself.
<yellow>This might cause rendering issues on some models!
Whether to use a baby model for others.
<yellow>This might cause rendering issues on some models!

own_variant.desc: Changes the cat variant used for yourself.

other_variant.desc: Changes the cat variant used for others.

own_variant.desc: Changes the fox variant used for yourself.

other_variant.desc: Changes the fox variant used for others.

own_variant.desc: Changes the wolf variant used for yourself.

other_variant.desc: Changes the wolf variant used for others.

own_state.desc: Changes the wolf state used for yourself.

other_state.desc: Changes the wolf state used for others.

own_variant.desc: Changes the axolotl variant that is used for yourself!

other_variant.desc: Changes the axolotl variant that is used for others!

own_variant.desc: Changes the chicken variant that is used for yourself!

other_variant.desc: Changes the chicken variant that is used for others!

own_variant.desc: Changes the copper golem weathering state that is used for yourself!

other_variant.desc: Changes the copper golem weathering state that is used for others!

own_block.desc: Changes the copper golem antenna block that is used for yourself!

other_block.desc: Changes the copper golem antenna block that is used for others!

own_variant.desc: Changes the cow variant that is used for yourself!

other_variant.desc: Changes the cow variant that is used for others!

own_variant.desc: Changes the frog variant used for yourself.

other_variant.desc: Changes the frog variant used for others.

own_variant.desc: Changes the mooshroom variant used for yourself.

other_variant.desc: Changes the mooshroom variant used for others.

own_variant.desc: Changes the parrot variant that is used for yourself!

other_variant.desc: Changes the parrot variant that is used for others!

own_variant.desc: Changes the pig variant that is used for yourself!

other_variant.desc: Changes the pig variant that is used for others!

own_variant.desc: Changes the rabbit variant that is used for yourself!

other_variant.desc: Changes the rabbit variant that is used for others!

own_variant.desc: Changes the salmon variant that is used for yourself!

other_variant.desc: Changes the salmon variant that is used for others!

own_pumpkin.desc: Changes the snow golem’s pumpkin state for yourself.

other_pumpkin.desc: Changes the snow golem’s pumpkin state for others.

own_color.desc: Changes the sheep color used for yourself.

other_color.desc: Changes the sheep color used for others.

own_jeb.desc: Whether you are a jeb_ sheep.

own_pattern.desc: Changes the tropical fish pattern that is used for yourself!

other_pattern.desc: Changes the tropical fish pattern that is used for others!

own_type.desc: Changes the villager type that is used for yourself!

other_type.desc: Changes the villager type that is used for others!

own_profession.desc: Changes the villager profession that is used for yourself!

other_profession.desc: Changes the villager profession that is used for others!

own_state.desc: Changes the iron golem crackiness that is used for yourself!

other_state.desc: Changes the iron golem crackiness that is used for others!

own_variant.desc: Changes the llama variant that is used for yourself!

other_variant.desc: Changes the llama variant that is used for others!

own_trader.desc: Whether the own llama is a trader llama or not!

other_trader.desc: Whether other llamas are trader llamas or not!

own_gene.desc: Changes the panda gene that is used for yourself!

other_gene.desc: Changes the panda gene that is used for others!

own_color.desc: Changes the shulker color that is used for yourself!

other_color.desc: Changes the shulker color that is used for others!

own_harness.desc: Changes the harness color that is used for yourself!

other_harness.desc: Changes the harness color that is used for others!

desc: Changes the entity that is used (by default cats).
<italic><white>Note that settings like variant and collar won’t work for non-cat models!</white></italic>

outside_skyblock.desc: Whether player animals should also be visible outside of SkyBlock.

trophy_numbers.desc: Displays the amount of trophy fishes you caught upon catching one.

hook_text_scale.desc: Changes the scale of the text above your fishing hook/bobber.

lava_replacement.desc: Replaces the lava texture with the water texture while in the Crimson Isle.

bobber_time.desc: Shows the time your bobber has existed.

hide_other_bobbers.desc: Hides other players' bobbers, making it easier to see your own.

hotspot.desc: All settings for the hotspot Features.

warning.desc: Sends a chat warning when a hotspot you recently fished at disappears.

circle_surface.desc: Render a "solid" circle instead of the particle outline.

desc: Changes the transparency of the surface.

circle_outline.desc: Render a "solid" outline instead of the particle outline.

desc: Changes the transparency of the outline.
All items that have any modification present in the lore are indicated with the selected modify indicator.
To list all modifications that are present press <gray>shift</gray>.
Some of the settings may include examples, <italic><gray>hover</gray></italic> them to see them.
Compacts the installed upgrade parts into one line each.
<gray>Adds <green>+1 Level</green> to all of your unlocked <purple>Heart of</purple></gray>
Adds the dungeon quality to the lore.
Compacts the bars in the SkyBlock levels menu into one line, making them fit on smaller screens.

armadillo_blocks_walked.desc: Shows how many blocks you have walked so far on a prehistory egg.

storage_preview.desc: Previews the contents of your backpacks and ender chest in the tooltip.

museum_donation.desc: Shows what items haven't been donated to museum in the tooltip.

dye_hex.desc: Shows the hex code of the dye on armors.

dye_pos.desc: Select where the color display square is positioned.

shiftCost.desc: Shows the amount of powder that will be consumed on shift click.

totalProgress.desc: Shows your total progress to maxing a perk.

stackSize.desc: Shows the perk level as item stack count.

totalLeft.desc: Displays the total amount that is still required to max a perk.

reminder.desc: Lets you add reminders for when you have enough whispers to buy a perk.

reminderTitle.desc: Shows a title when the reminder triggers.

muteThePhantoms.desc: Mutes all phantoms making them not induce ear pain.
muteThePhantoms.warning: <yellow>SkyOcean mutes the phantom sounds by default, if you wish to change this open the config and search for <gold>Mute the Phantoms</gold>!

moongladeBeaconColor.desc: Changes the Moonglade Beacon beam color in Galatea to <red>Red</red> if it's inactive, and <green>green</green> if its active.

shulkerOverwrite.desc: Recolors the shulkers to make them more visible.

desc: Shows a CSGO case opening animation when opening a dungeon chest.
This feature is recreation from the 1.8 mod <hover 'Click to visit their GitHub'><url 'https://github.com/Ev-Hoang/Bedrock-Chest-Case-Opening'><blue>Bedrock Chest Case Opening</blue></url></hover>.

croesus.@value: Also Show Case Opening in Croesus
croesus.desc: Will hide croesus summary before opening the chest, to not spoil the surprise.

buttons.enable_first: Enable inventory buttons in the Config first!

keybind.crafthelper: Set as active Craft Helper Item
